name: Parallel Project Training
overview:
Parallel Project Training is a Berkshire-based project management training provider that offers a highly innovative approach to project management training. Their courses include APMP, planning, risk management, estimating, and project leadership and lead to professional accreditation where available. The training courses are delivered using a combination of printed study material, e-learning, podcasts, webinars and classroom workshops.

Parallel’s flexible approach to delivering project management training includes tailoring courses to the particular needs of corporate clients and offering training either in-house or at its own London and Reading training centres. They offer businesses and individuals training in all of the major recognised project management methodologies including APMP, PRINCE2 and PMP.
